title: I am 19, female. My vocal range is E3-F6. What voice classification am I? - Quora

response.answer_text: This probably depends on where you think you sound the best! If it’s in your low/middle range, you are most likely a mezzo soprano and if it’s in your high range, you’re most likely a soprano. Also, which notes come with ease? For me, I have greater difficulty hitting a Bb5 than F3…. So while I can hit “both”, the fact that I have an easier time navigating my lower range indicates that I’m a mezzo soprano! Finally, when I was younger, I was convinced I had a range of C3-C6…. This was not the case, because I… well… couldn’t sing that range at all. So maybe something “has to give” whether it’s in your high or low register. For me, it was kinda both; as of now, I have a range of approx F#3-B5, but I’m working on my strengthening my high notes. I hope this helps, and if that is indeed your true range, it’s quite a remarkable one!
